It's silly because that prevents people from seeding after download finishes - they have so high ratio already - and by the way - in that moment usually comes to mind that eztv is a "cheaper" solution -traffic/bandwidth/cost-wise.
Also, it is totally unwanted 'cause We do not support true, ugly leeching, right?

Excellent. I'm so happy to find someone who can do a conservatively sized encoding for a TV show. EZTV is a good institution, but 350mb for an hour of video is too big: apparently a vestige of when people burned films to DVDs.
U r da Man .. the Best .. regards from India ..
